card.name: Aftershock
card.text: Destroy target artifact, creature, or land. Aftershock deals 3 damage to you.

card.name: Aluren
card.text: Any player may play creature cards with converted mana cost 3 or less without paying their mana cost and as though they had flash.

card.name: Anarchist
card.text: When Anarchist enters the battlefield, you may return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Angelic Blessing
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn.

card.text: Choose two target creatures controlled by the same player. Exile one of those creatures and put two +1/+1 counters on the other.

card.name: Carnophage

card.name: Charging Paladin
card.text: Whenever Charging Paladin attacks, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Cinder Marsh
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool. Cinder Marsh doesn't untap during your next untap step.

card.name: Coat of Arms
card.text: Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares at least one creature type with it.

card.name: Coercion
card.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Coffin Queen
card.text: You may choose not to untap Coffin Queen during your untap step. {2}{B}, {T}: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. When Coffin Queen becomes untapped or you lose control of Coffin Queen, exile that creature.

card.name: Craven Giant
card.text: Craven Giant can't block.

card.text: Crovax the Cursed enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Crovax. If you don't, remove a +1/+1 counter from Crovax. {B}: Crovax gains flying until end of turn.

card.text: Shadow When Thalakos Seer leaves the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Thopter Squadron
card.text: Flying Thopter Squadron enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Thopter Squadron: Put a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying onto the battlefield. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery. {1}, Sacrifice another Thopter: Put a +1/+1 counter on Thopter Squadron. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Thrull Surgeon
card.text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice Thrull Surgeon: Look at target player's hand and choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Time Ebb
card.text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Time Warp
card.text: Target player takes an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Tradewind Rider
card.text: Flying {T}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Tranquility
card.text: Destroy all enchantments.

card.name: Twitch
card.text: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land. Draw a card.

card.name: Vampire Hounds
card.text: Discard a creature card: Vampire Hounds gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Vec Townships
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool. Vec Townships doesn't untap during your next untap step.

card.name: Verdant Force
card.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Verdant Touch
card.text: Buyback {3} Target land becomes a 2/2 creature that's still a land.

card.name: Verdigris
card.text: Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Vhati il-Dal
card.text: {T}: Until end of turn, target creature has base power 1 or base toughness 1.

card.name: Victual Sliver
card.text: All Slivers have "{2}, Sacrifice this permanent: You gain 4 life."

card.name: Volrath's Curse
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated. That creature's controller may sacrifice a permanent for that player to ignore this effect until end of turn. {1}{U}: Return Volrath's Curse to its owner's hand.

card.name: Volrath's Laboratory
card.text: As Volrath's Laboratory enters the battlefield, choose a color and a creature type. {5}, {T}: Put a 2/2 creature token of the chosen color and type onto the battlefield.

card.name: Volrath's Stronghold
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}{B}, {T}: Put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.

card.name: Wall of Blossoms
card.text: Defender When Wall of Blossoms enters the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Wall of Diffusion
card.text: Defender Wall of Diffusion can block creatures with shadow as though Wall of Diffusion had shadow.

card.name: Wall of Essence
card.text: Defender Whenever Wall of Essence is dealt combat damage, you gain that much life.

card.name: Wall of Souls
card.text: Defender Whenever Wall of Souls is dealt combat damage, it deals that much damage to target opponent.

card.name: Warrior en-Kor
card.text: {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Warrior en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.

card.name: Wasteland
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Wasteland: Destroy target nonbasic land.

card.name: Wayward Soul
card.text: Flying {U}: Put Wayward Soul on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Whispers of the Muse
card.text: Buyback {5} Draw a card.

card.name: Wind Dancer
card.text: Flying {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Winds of Rath
card.text: Destroy all creatures that aren't enchanted. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Winged Sliver
card.text: All Sliver creatures have flying.

card.name: Wood Sage
card.text: {T}: Name a creature card. Reveal the top four cards of your library and put all of them with that name into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Youthful Knight
card.text: First strike
